title: “Credit Union Fund” means the fund established under section 57 of the Act of
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Credit Union Fund (Stabilisation)
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Credit Union Fund (Stabilisation) 

Levy Regulations 2021. 

Definitions
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited credit union fund (stabilisation) levy regulation 2021 definition

title: “Credit Union Fund” means the fund established under section 57 of the Act of
heading: In these Regulations -
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations - 

“Act of 2012” means the Credit Union and Co-operation with Overseas 
Regulators Act 2012 (No. 40 of 2012); 

“Credit Union Fund” means the fund established under section 57 of the Act of 
2012; 

“credit union levy” means the contribution to the Credit Union Fund, by a credit 
union, referred to in section 59(3) of the Act of 2012; 

“levy period” means the period beginning on 1 October 2021 and ending on 30 
September 2022; 

“Minister” means the Minister for Finance; 

“Registrar of Credit Unions” means the Registrar of Credit Unions appointed 
under section 33X (inserted by section 26 of the Central Bank and Financial 
Services Authority of Ireland Act 2003 (No. 12 of 2003)) of the Central Bank 
Act 1942 (No. 22 of 1942); 

“total assets of the credit union” means - 

(a) 

the total assets reported by that credit union in the balance sheet 
of that credit union forming part of the quarterly prudential return 
made to the Registrar of Credit Unions in respect of the reporting 
date of 30 September 2021, or 

(b) where a credit union has not reported the quarterly prudential 
return in respect of that reporting date, the total assets reported by 
that credit union in the balance sheet of that credit union forming 
part of the quarterly prudential return made to the Registrar of 
Credit Unions in respect of the reporting date of 30 June 2021. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 24th September, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Application of regulations

title: “Credit Union Fund” means the fund established under section 57 of the Act of
heading: 4. Each credit union to which these Regulations apply shall pay a credit
text_raw:
4. Each credit union to which these Regulations apply shall pay a credit 
union levy in respect of the levy period to the Minister for the account of the 
Credit Union Fund at the rate of 0.0015033 per cent of the total assets of the 
credit union. 

Payment of levy
text_norm: 4 credit union regulation apply shall pay credit union levy respect levy period minister account credit union fund rate 0.0015033 per cent total asset credit union payment levy

title: “Credit Union Fund” means the fund established under section 57 of the Act of
heading: 5. Each credit union to which these Regulations apply that is liable to pay
text_raw:
5. Each credit union to which these Regulations apply that is liable to pay 
the credit union levy under these Regulations shall make such payment to the 
Minister not later than 28 February 2022. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

21 September, 2021. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance.
